selectionProfile.Name: Everything
selectionProfile.Definition: <SelectionProfile><Include path="Applications" /><Include path="Operating Systems" /><Include path="Out-of-Box Drivers" /><Include path="Packages" /><Include path="Task Sequences" /></SelectionProfile>

selectionProfile.Name: All Drivers and Packages
selectionProfile.Comments: Include all driver folders and all packages folders.

selectionProfile.Name: Sample
selectionProfile.Definition: <SelectionProfile><Include path="Applications\Redmond" /><Exclude path="Applications\Redmond\Accounting" /><Include path="Applications\Redmond\Accounting\Payables" /><Include path="Operating Systems\x86" /><Include path="Packages" /><Include path="Task Sequences" /></SelectionProfile>

selectionProfile.Name: SEVEN64BITDRIVER

selectionProfile.Name: WindowsSevenOffline

selectionProfile.Name: Windows8offline
selectionProfile.Definition: <SelectionProfile><Include path="Applications\Microsoft" /><Include path="Operating Systems\Windows 8" /><Include path="Out-of-Box Drivers\IBM" /><Include path="Out-of-Box Drivers\HPDL320" /><Include path="Out-of-Box Drivers\HP800G1" /><Include path="Out-of-Box Drivers\PROLIANT" /><Include path="Task Sequences\windows8offline" /></SelectionProfile>

selectionProfile.Name: 2012Offline
selectionProfile.Definition: <SelectionProfile><Include path="Operating Systems\2012Server" /><Include path="Out-of-Box Drivers\PROLIANT" /><Include path="Task Sequences\Offline2012" /></SelectionProfile>
